onboardingSubtitle.message: Automatically discover location info for Threads users

onboardingFeature1.message: Displays location and join date for Threads post authors

onboardingFeature2.message: Automatically fetches profile info as you scroll

onboardingFeature3.message: Highlights new users (joined within 30 days) with a [NEW] badge

onboardingFeature4.message: View location statistics in the popup panel

onboardingControlDesc.message: You can toggle Auto-query on or off at any time by clicking the extension icon in your browser toolbar.

onboardingStep1Desc.message: Find the Lee-Su-Threads icon in your browser's extension toolbar (usually in the top-right corner).

onboardingStep2Desc.message: Use the switch in the popup to enable or disable automatic profile fetching.

onboardingStep3Desc.message: Check out the "Location Stats" tab to see where your feed authors are from!

onboardingFooter.message: Made with ❤️ for the Threads community
